titleinfo.title: Indians for Indians Radio Show, March 28, 1950

mods.tableOfContents: Willie Wilds, Solo. Chief Song. Flag Song. Memorial Song. Honor Song (Wounded Song or Purple Heart Song). Newashe Song. Laguna Pueblo (Dog Tail Song). Swan Dance (Sioux Indians). Moccasin Game. Kickapoo Squaw Hop Songs. War Dances. Greeting Song and Going Away Song. Brave Dance Song. Women Give-Away Song.
mods.note: When citing recordings from this collection, please using the following: Indians for Indians Radio Show. Western History Collections, University of Oklahoma Libraries.
